official_title: A bill to provide for the exchange of certain lands within Tuolumne County, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to a named individual all right, title, and interest of the United States in certain described real property in exchange for the conveyance of all right, title and interest in certain described real property held by said individual to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the exchange of certain lands within Tuolumne County, California.
